title: FS T205 raw including Black AB backs!

posts.post_title: FS T205 raw including Black AB backs!
posts.post_content:
Purchases over $500 include shipping and insurance.  Purchases under $500 please add $5 for shipping.  All prices are net (check, money order, Paypal friends and family) to me.  Add 3% for Paypal goods and services.  Credit card available +4%.  Prices are subject to change without notice.  “I’ll take it” trumps any negotiations or offers.  PM or email me at [url]hcv123@att.net[/url]  to reserve.  I collect sales tax from NY state residents.


Numbers are my opinion of how the card(s) would grade

Austin SC42    VG-3
Bailey  SC42   G-2
Bates  Hassan
